thread.title: Oscars 2017: Nicole Kidman wears nude Armani dress | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Nicole Kidman wears nude Armani dress | Daily Mail Online

author: Jody Phan
title: Oscars 2017: Nicole Kidman wears nude Armani dress | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 135 shares The Lion actress exuded ethereal beauty as she posed in the custom-made designer frock, which featured intricate patterns made of sparkly jewels. Her figure looked flawless in the daring gown, which featured a plunging back and jewel-encrusted straps that crossed at the shoulders. A moment of panic: The 49-year-old actress revealed she suffered a wardrobe malfunction on the way to the awards, when the strap broke on her dress The mother-of-four was dripping in diamonds on her special night, sporting bracelets on both wrists as well as drop earrings. Joined by her husband Keith Urban for Hollywood's night of nights, the Australian beauty oozed glamour with her vibrant makeup look. She wore a bright shade of red lipstick while keeping her porcelain complexion looking flawless with foundation and a hint of pink blush. Power couple: The Lion star was joined by her husband Keith Urban for Hollywood's night of nights Her special night: The Australian beauty is hoping to take home the Best Supporting Actress award for her role in Lion Her strawberry blonde locks were swept to one side and tied up in a woven bun for the special event. Lashings of mascara completed the stunner's look for the star-studded event. She added height to the ensemble with a pair of nude strappy heels to match her dress. Loved-up: Keith, 49, couldn't keep his hands off his talented wife as they posed for photographers Keith meanwhile, cut a dapper figure as he walked the red carpet with his wife hand-in-hand. The 49-year-old country music singer wore a black tux with patent shoes, adding a bow tie to the classic ensemble. It appears the spark between the husband and wife is still strong, with Keith seeming unable to keep his hands off his wife in front of the crowds. Elegant: Nicole oozed glamour while sporting a shade of red lipstick, while her husband looked dapper in a classic black tux The Somebody Like You hitmaker was seen patting his wife's bottom as they posed for photographers. Speaking to Mail Online's red carpet correspondent Baz Bamigboye, Nicole referred to herself as a gentle 'kitten' as opposed to her movie's namesake Lion. 'Lioness? No. I'm a kitten,' the actress laughed. Keith quipped: 'Kitten? I don't know about that.' 'I'm a kitten': Laughing off a comment that she's a lioness, Nicole referred to herself as a 'kitten' instead, to which her husband responded: 'Kitten? I don't know about that' Nicole is a hopeful winner of the Best Supporting Actress award for her role in the Australian adoption tale Lion. However, she's up up against some tough competition in Viola Davis for Fences, Naomie Harris for Moonlight, Octavia Spencer for Hidden Figures, and Michelle Williams for Manchester by the Sea. She previously won Best Actress at the 2003 ceremony, for her role in The Hours. Tough competition: Nicole is up against some tough competition for the award, including Viola Davis, Naomie Harris, Octavia Spencer and Michelle Williams (pictured as character Sue Brierley in Lion) Read more: Share or comment on this article 135
